alert.note: Alert for Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:38AM CDT until April 05 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN OZARK...DOUGLAS AND NORTHEASTERN TANEY COUNTIES... At 638 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles east of Taneyville, or 14 miles southwest of Ava, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bryant Creek State Park, Ava, Wasola, Brixey, Noble, Brushyknob, Brownbranch, Gentryville, Thornfield, Rome, Vanzant, Squires, Bradleyville, Dora, Goodhope, Rockbridge and Drury. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for southwestern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
